content.description: Start on sidepulls under the bulge right of Rated X and go up, strenuously.
content.protection: 1–2 pads. Topping the bulge feels spooky.

content.description: From a stand start, climb the overhanging arête using big moves between large holds.
content.location: The right arête of the overhanging face.

content.description: Climb the arête, starting from opposing sidepulls about 5' up.
content.location: The left arête of the overhanging face.

content.description:
Sit start to Girls on Film. The stand start can be lackluster, as it is basically two moves.  This line adds a couple fun moves before the top, definitely worth hopping on if you're in the area.

The grade is subject to minor controversy. It was given V10 in the first edition of the guidebook, with the community suggesting as low as V8. It was downgraded to V8 in the second edition of the guidebook, and will likely remain there as a stout area benchmark.
content.location: Follow directions for Rated X boulder/Girls On Film.

content.description: Stand start with a high right sidepull about 6' up in the middle of the overhanging face, and a left hand on the arête (or closer if you're short).  Climb up left to a small pocket (crux), and continue upward.
content.protection: A camera, to get your gf's first V7 on film... or just a crashpad.
content.location: The obvious overhanging face of the boulder.

content.description: All the shoulder-busting joy of Girls Gone Wild with the jumpy finish of Girls on Film we all love! What could be better? Start as for Rated X on the opposing side-pulls, move up left to the jug, match, and make a long reach out to the double-crimp hold on Girls on Film, effectively reversing the crux move on Girls Gone Wild. Match (ouch), get your feet under you, and finish as for Girls on Film.
content.protection: Two pads should be adequate to protect the crux in the middle of the wall and the last couple moves on Girls on Film.
content.location: Start as for Rated X. See the description for more details.

content.description: Sit start Girls on Film and traverse right to finish on Rated X. You didn't really need that shoulder, anyway.
content.protection: If you've rehearsed Rated X, conceivably no pads because the crux is right off the ground. Preferably multiple pads for convenience plus a spotter for the topout.
